threat: If a user or automated system were tricked into opening a specially crafted  document, an attacker could possibly obtain access to arbitrary files or  cause resource consumption.
If a user or automated system were tricked into opening a  specially crafted document, an attacker could possibly cause libxml2 to  crash, resulting in a denial of service.
